Module: node-ordering/count-crossings

(require("node-ordering/count-crossings"))(G, orderA, orderB)

Count the total number of crossings between 2 layers. This is the sum of the countBetweenCrossings and countLoopCrossings.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
G Graph The graph.
orderA Array List of node ids on left side.
orderB Array List of node ids on right side.
Source:
  • node-ordering/count-crossings.js, line 12

Methods

(static) countBetweenCrossings(G, orderA, orderB)

Count the number of crossings of edges passing between 2 layers. Algorithm from http://jgaa.info/accepted/2004/BarthMutzelJuenger2004.8.2.pdf
Parameters:
Name Type Description
G Graph The graph.
orderA Array List of node ids on left side.
orderB Array List of node ids on right side.
Source:
  • node-ordering/count-crossings.js, line 29

(static) countLoopCrossings(G, orderA, orderB)

Count the number of crossings from within-layer edges.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
G Graph The graph.
orderA Array List of node ids on left side.
orderB Array List of node ids on right side.

  • node-ordering/count-crossings.js, line 80
